beer.beer_description: I Got You is a brand new step-mashed tart wheat beer draws influence from the traditional Berliner Weisse but with a vibrant, tropical sour twist. In true OD fashion, we’ve cranked it up to 305 and amplified this wee number using our in-house lacto culture, then loaded it with huge doses of pineapple ?, Feijoa ?(?), watermelon ?, and coconut water ? during fermentation. Tropical, tasty, and oh-so vibrant.

items.badge_description: Happy Sour Beer Day! September 20th marks the refreshing beginning of Sour Beer Day 2025, ripe for celebration! No need to sugarcoat it, these tart treats aren’t for everyone, but that’s just fine with sour lovers like us. Let us berry the hatchet and squeeze the day! Follow @untappd and drop a comment with your favorite sour!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

Tropical, tasty, and oh-so vibrant.

items.badge_description: It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 5 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 2. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 5 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 5 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 2!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 10 check-ins with a photo.

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 5 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 2! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 10 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 3.

Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 15 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 4.
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 5 beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 2.
